wikipedia_page.main: Philip Edmund Duffy KSG, GRSM, ARMCM, PGCE, Hon FGCM, FHEA, FRSCM (born 1943) was the Master of the Music at the Liverpool Metropolitan Cathedral from 1966 to 1996, and lectured at Liverpool Hope University from 2000 to 2013. He is the founder and director of the Liverpool Bach Collective.

response: *Philip Duffy, English composer of sacred music
